name: Believer's Boon
prerequisiteFormula: all(@wis_score>=13,"alignment must be within one step of your deity's")

description.text: Your deity rewards you for your faithfulness.

sections.Benefit: When you take this feat, choose one domain granted by your deity. You can use the 1st-level domain ability that clerics of that domain can use a number of times or rounds per day, but you can use it only once per day or 1 round per day, whichever is appropriate. Your effective cleric level in regard to this ability is 1st level. If the domain has a 1st-level ability that does not meet this specification, you cannot use it.
sections.Special: You can take this feat twice. When you take it a second time, you choose another domain granted by your deity.
